title: When the N. Market St. Porters Neck road widening project was being laid out, the public was pitched the plan of a tree lined median.  So far there have only been a handful planted.  Are more slated to be installed?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2015/06/are-more-trees-going-to-be-planted-in-the-new-market-street-median/
